channel.title: Few things
channel.description:
-----INFO----
[ul][li]Revison: 525[/li] [li]Base: Relentless525 [/li][/ul]
------- [FIX IT] [HOW DO I ADD] ------ 1. [how would i fix this] everytime im at clan wars and i try to right click the right click disapears like i never did it in like 1 second. Also, everytime they click the portals they disconnect how would i delete the portals all together.
2. [how would i fix this] i added drags and everytime someone attacks one then does not kill it no one else can attack it only that 1 person unless i restart the server how would i fix this???
3. [how would i fix this] my tb stays on the person till the log how would i fix this i checked in playmagic and their wasnt a timer for it just this
[code]} opp.teleblocked = 1; opp.requestGFX(1843, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You have teleport blocked your opponent."); break;[/code]
4. [how would i add this] i want to add corp could some one find me a tut or make a tut for me how to add corp n the right place and how to edit its drops.
5. [how would i fix this] my friends list dont work it just says the person is offline
6. [how would i fix this] clan chat works ok just when u log out it deletes itself :/ how would i fix this
7. [how would i add this] how would i add a anti-null or anti-ddos or w.e it is because i been nulled 3 times and ddosed once and i can't stop this from happening i feel retarted how do i fix this
PLEASE HELP ME WITH ANY OF THESE I'll be happy :)

item.title: Few things

item.description:

-----INFO----

  1. [how would i fix this] everytime im at clan wars and i try to right click the right click disapears like i never did it in like 1 second. Also, everytime they click the portals they disconnect how would i delete the portals all together.

  2. [how would i fix this] i added drags and everytime someone attacks one then does not kill it no one else can attack it only that 1 person unless i restart the server how would i fix this???

  3. [how would i fix this] my tb stays on the person till the log how would i fix this i checked in playmagic and their wasnt a timer for it just this

} opp.teleblocked = 1; opp.requestGFX(1843, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You have teleport blocked your opponent."); break;

PLEASE HELP ME WITH ANY OF THESE I’ll be happy
